sk1.name: Devour
sk1.desc: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.

sk2.name: Scorched Earth
sk2.desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames, damaging enemies while Doom gains bonus HP regen and increased movement speed.

sk3.name: Lvl Death
sk3.desc: Dissipates a piece of an enemy Hero's soul, mini-stunning and dealing bonus damage equal to 20%% of the target's maximum health when the enemy's level is a multiple of a specific number or 25.

sk4.name: Doom
sk4.desc: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time. Doom also disables most passive abilities and removes positive buffs on cast. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
